original_text: But Israel reached out his right hand and put it on Ephraim’s head, though he was the younger, and crossing his arms, he put his left hand on Manasseh’s head, even though Manasseh was the firstborn.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 오른손을 펴서 차남 에브라임의 머리에 얹고 왼손을 펴서 므낫세의 머리에 얹으니 므낫세는 장자라도 팔을 엇바꾸어 얹었더라

sentences.original_text: But Israel reached out his right hand
and put it on Ephraim's head
he put his left hand on Manasseh's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 왼손을 므낫세의 머리에 올렸다

sentences.original_text: even though Manasseh was the firstborn
